IdentityProviderDetails.description: You can provide a structure that contains the details for the identity provider to use with your web app.

ApplicationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 10  
Maximum Length: 1224  
Pattern: ^arn:[\w-]+:sso::\d{12}:application/(sso)?ins-[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{16}/apl-[a-zA-Z0-9]{16}$  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the IAM Identity Center used for the web app.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the IAM Identity Center used for the web app.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 10  
Maximum Length: 1224  
Pattern: ^arn:[\w-]+:sso:::instance/(sso)?ins-[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{16}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Role.description: The IAM role in IAM Identity Center used for the web app.
Role.markdownDescription:
The IAM role in IAM Identity Center used for the web app.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z-]+:iam::[0-9]{12}:role[:/]\S+$  
Update requires: No interruption
